metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Happy Xmas (War Is Over) is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Happy Xmas (War Is Over) has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Mixolydian,  and A Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
